[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/package.c

Basic inheritable for a package. The main difference between this and /obj/baggage is that the value of this is the sum of the values of the items in the package.

Written by ceres

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/baggage.c

Method index

query_value()

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.
